Vivant Skincare, Sulfur Clay Mask

Brand: Vivant

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Active Ingredient: Precipitated Sulfur 10.00%

Inactive Ingredients: Water, Kaolin, Talc, Bentonite, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Saccharomyces/Zinc Ferment, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol

Directions: Cleanse skin thoroughly before applying a generous layer of Sulfu

erous layer of Sulfur Clay Mask to the entire face, avoiding the eye area. Wait 15 minutes before washing thoroughly. 

Using a damp cloth, gently wipe away the mask residue, then rinse with warm water to remove all traces. Follow with toner, corrective serum, and moisturizer if desired.

New users should perform a sensitivity test by applying prod

est by applying product to a small affected area or to inside of wrist during. If no discomfort occurs within three days, proceed with normal usage. 

Do not use on broken skin or apply to large areas of the body.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Cancer; LOW: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
